original_title: Adam Ant: Dirk Live at the Apollo
overview: Adam Ant's live performance of his first album, Dirk Wears White Sox, recorded at London's Aventim Apollo in 2014.
tagline: "Still sounds majestic... a chill inducing, pulverising, pulsating performance" VIVE LE ROCK
title: Adam Ant: Dirk Live at the Apollo
